text:
@marcorubio We also have a degree of confidence that @realDonaldTrump didnt do anything to curb Covid19 bc presidenting is too hard for him when he's only thinking about getting reelected. 

@VP is so far up @afphq's ass, he and @TimPhillipsAFP regularly consult behind trump's back.
